content: Im interested in reaction from this community to my thread in #Security and Privacy on audit including Patient indication whenever possible. https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179247-Security-and.20Privacy/topic/AuditEvent.20for.20Patient

Are any of the DaVinci tracks creating any AuditEvent or Provenance records? I don't care at this point if it is formally defined or just happening... I am working on an app that consumes AuditEvent and would like to find some.
